**Bombshell Pro** by Emily Conners [2012]:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219143812/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/")  
(I can't find this alternate |t| but I suppose it finally exists)

I think it's the standard /t where the "loose" cross bar has been moved left and down.
